https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bp8AVfRZtqrVemu1B3EYghc4Kyn.jpg Not having the courage to love, Toru became an adult. One day, he meets his and old friend who happens to find a poem which changes will his fate. This will make Toru gain enough courage to face love once again. He meets a girl Nagi who is bond into his fate, though she has a particular secret Aiuta: My Promise to Nakuhito
